location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Biographies of the notables of Fars and certain Persian officials who have served at Shiraz. Delhi: Government of India, 1925'

physicalDescription.extent: A table of contents can be found at folio 4.An index to the biographies arranged by name can be found at folios 45-48.An index to the biographies arranged by title (and some family names) can be found at folios 49-51.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 54; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the file also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The volume contains lists of, and genealogical tables and biographies for, the notable families of Fars [Fārs] and Persian Officials at Shiraz [Shīrāz].The volume includes a 'Sketch Map of Boundaries of Districts of Fars', found in a pocket at the rear of the volume (folio 53).
